example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (VP (VV 需要) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 额外)) (NP (NN 学额)))) (VP (MSP 以) (VP (VV 照顾) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (ADVP (AD 更)) (ADJP (JJ 多))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VV 合) (NP-OBJ (NN 资格))) (VP (VV 来) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 港))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 儿童)))))))
